content.raw: This provides complete reset to zero.  By sending a jointstates command with i_effort_min/max set equal, I suppose we can initialize the integral at one time step.  Together, they satisfy my original request.  thanks.
content.html: This provides complete reset to zero. By sending a jointstates command with i_effort_min/max set equal, I suppose we can initialize the integral at one time step. Together, they satisfy my original request. thanks.
